grid.placeholderSubtitle: There are no product in the system, you can create the first one.
grid.groupPlaceholderSubtitle: There are no product added to the group, you can add the first one.
grid.variantPlaceholderSubtitle: Choose products which together will create a product with variants. You can choose between products which contain selected binding attributes.
grid.productsToAttachForGroupPlaceholderSubti: There are either no product with variants nor simple products in the system, you can create the first one.
